name: John Doe
review: This is the review from John Doe. It was a great experience participating at Seneca Hackathon!

review: Jane Smith's feedback is positive. She enjoyed the Seneca Hackathon and learned a lot!

review: Emily Davis appreciates the organizers and participants. A well-organized event!
